template.name: kwargs
template.value: for key, value in mydic.items() : print (key, value)
template.description: Print keys/values pairs from a dictonary

template.name: keyval
template.value: for key, value in mydict.items(): key_values = (key, ',', value)
template.description: Read keys and values from a dictonary

template.name: bash_opts
template.value:
function usage { echo echo -e "Usage: script.sh <opt>" echo echo "Example - script.sh thing" exit }
if [ -n "$1" ]; then var="$1" else usage fi
